food.name: Burrito
food.description: Wheat flour tortilla wrapped or folded around a filling

food.name: Enchilada
food.description: A corn or flour tortilla rolled around a filling and covered with a chili peper sauce

food.name: Fajita
food.description: Any grilled meat served on a flour or corn tortilla

food.name: Quesadilla
food.description: Flour or corn tortilla filled with a savoury mixture containing cheese and other ingredients

food.name: Makizushi
food.description: Roll generally wrapped in nori(seaweed) and usually cut in 6 or 8 pieces

food.name: Nigirizushi
food.description: Fish drapped over an oblong mound of sushi rice

food.name: Temaki
food.description: Large cone-shaped piece of nori on the outside and the ingredients spilling out the wide end
